data.comment: The match has started.
Jo's header is off-target for Corinthians.
In the minute 2, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Coritiba's Sabino gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Corinthians!
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Fagner for Corinthians who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 9, Fagner returns to the field for Corinthians after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Curitiba.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 13, Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Important block from the Coritiba defence as Fagner fires in a strike for Corinthians.
In the minute 14, Corinthians to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In Curitiba, Fabio Santos (Corinthians) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 16, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Corinthians capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Coritiba's half?
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 20, An attacking Corinthians player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Mailton (Coritiba) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Fabio Santos gives Corinthians a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 23, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Estadio Couto Pereira.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Coritiba are pushing forward but Matheus Bueno's finish is wide of the goal.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Corinthians throw-in in Coritiba's half.
In the minute 29, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 32, Giovanni Augusto of Coritiba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Corinthians.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Corinthians a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians surge into the attack at Estadio Couto Pereira but Lucas Piton Crivellaroâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 44, Bruno Mendez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Coritiba.
Gabriel gets his shot on target but fails to score for Corinthians.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 45, Bruno Mendez is back on the pitch.
In Curitiba Coritiba's Robson is caught offside.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Couto Pereira.
The second half has started at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Corinthians at Estadio Couto Pereira.
The home team replace Mattheus with Pablo Thomaz.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Corinthians have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Coritiba.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
In the minute 50, Jo of Corinthians is pulled up for offside.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Corinthians at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Coritiba throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 57, Corinthians have a dangerous throw-in.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Corinthians, close to Coritiba's area.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 60, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Corinthians throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Pablo Thomaz (Coritiba) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Corinthians defenders.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Brayan Lucumi is replacing Robson for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Luan (Corinthians) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
In the minute 66, Coritiba needs to be cautious. Corinthians have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Corinthians.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Corinthians.
Fagner is booked for the away team.
In the minute 69, Vagner Mancini (Corinthians) is making a first substitution, with Everaldo replacing Lucas Piton Crivellaro.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Coritiba are coming forward and Rhodolfo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 70, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured William Matheus.
In the minute 73, William Matheus for Coritiba is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vagner Mancini is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Couto Pereira with Gabriel Pereira replacing Roni Medeiros de Moura.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Luan with Juan Cazares. This is the third substitution made today by Vagner Mancini.
Osman is replacing Matheus Bueno for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 78, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Giovanni Augusto (Coritiba) has received a yellow card from Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 79, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
In the minute 80, Corinthians will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Coritiba.
Giovanni Augusto (Coritiba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Matheus Sales with Matheus Galdezani. This is the fourth substitution made today by Rodrigo Santana.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Rodrigo Santana (Coritiba) is making a fifth substitution, with Martin Sarrafiore replacing Giovanni Augusto.
In the minute 84, In Curitiba Coritiba drive forward through Matheus Galdezani. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Vagner Mancini is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Couto Pereira with Ederson replacing Gabriel.
Guilherme Camacho is replacing Joao Vitor Xavier de Almeida for the away team.
In the minute 87, Gabriel Pereira of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pablo Thomaz (Coritiba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Estadio Couto Pereira.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Curitiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Corinthians.
Free kick Coritiba.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Coritiba throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians's Jo is whistled for offside at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
